actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of Interior to establish the Ronald Reagan Birthplace National Historic Site in Tampico, Illinois, and for other purposes.
short_title: Ronald Reagan Birthplace Historic Site Establishment Act
subjects: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

summary.text:
Ronald Reagan Birthplace Historic Site Establishment Act

Directs the Department of the Interior to: (1) purchase the Ronald Reagan Birthplace and Museum in Tampico, Illinois, from a willing seller, (2) designate it as the Ronald Reagan Birthplace Historic Site, and (3) prepare a general management plan for such Site.

titles.title: Ronald Reagan Birthplace Historic Site Establishment Act
To authorize the Secretary of Interior to establish the Ronald Reagan Birthplace National Historic Site in Tampico, Illinois, and for other purposes.
